name: Harp Seal Baby
description:
Our limited edition screen-print of Harp Seal Baby for Sea Shepherd is bright and crisp with beautiful contrast between the natural birch wood and the vibrant print. We used a 12" x 18.5" x 3/4" formaldehyde-free birch wood panel to print on and attached a metal bracket on the back for easy hanging. For every Harp Seal Baby print purchased here we will donate $20 directly to the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society. 


Website: http://www.thelifeimagined.com/ 

Our Heros: http://www.seashepherd.org/
